title: Halsey Beshears
summary: Halsey W. Beshears (born November 27, 1971 in Winter Park, Florida) is a Republican politician from Florida. He served as the Secretary of the Florida Department of Business and Professional Regulation (DBPR) from January 2019 to January 2021. Previously, he was a member of the Florida House of Representatives, representing parts of the Florida Panhandle from 2012 until his appointment as DBPR secretary.
